pages.text: $(thing)Go to Location/$ is pretty straightforward: the $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ will go to the nearest reachable location within the specified $(l:programming/area)Area/$.$(p)This widget is done $(ttcolor)$(t:You can configure the widget to be 'done' immediately; right-click for the setup GUI)when the Drone has reached the area/$, or when this area isn't reachable.
